Parameters: boolean: Boolean indicating whether or not to show the title view.
showTitleView(boolean).Description: Show or hide title view in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseSupportFragment_E@ for fragments mapped to @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PageRow_E@. Otherwise the request is ignored, in that case BrowseSupportFragment is fully in control of showing/hiding title view. When HeadersSupportFragment is visible, BrowseSupportFragment will hide search affordance view if there are other focusable rows above currently focused row.

ClassDesc: Possible set of actions that @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseSupportFragment_E@ exposes to clients. Custom fragments can interact with @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseSupportFragment_E@ using this interface.
